cards.name: Lunge
cards.description:
Deal 11 (14) damage to ALL enemies 2 times and lose 1 Dexterity per enemy.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Unbridled Hammer
cards.description: Deal 5 damage to a random enemy X (+1) times. runesmith:Enhance a random card in your hand X (+1) times.

relics.name: Chemical Blood
relics.description: Every time you lose HP equal to 25% of your max HP, gain a random potion.
relics.flavorText: Easily flammable.

relics.name: Empty Skull
relics.description: Whenever you play the last remaining card in your hand, shuffle an Inspiration into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: The skull of a once great, empty-headed Philosopher.

relics.name: Enhanced Actuators
relics.description: Gain 1 Strength for every 2 orb slots.
relics.flavorText: Big actuators... equal big... gains?

relics.name: Hidden Compartment
relics.description: At the start of each combat, remove a card from your draw pile. The first time you shuffle your draw pile, add this card into your hand.
relics.flavorText: There is no shame in deception.

relics.name: Pocket Mushroom
relics.description: The first time you take unblocked attack damage each combat, deal 12 damage back.
relics.flavorText: A Mushroom concealed in your skirt in case of danger.

relics.name: Trusty Knives
relics.description: Whenever you lose a Knife, gain 1 Protection.
relics.flavorText: It would be embarrassing if you were to cut yourself.

relics.name: Vile Toxins
relics.description: Poison deals 4 additional damage.
relics.flavorText: It bubbles menacingly.

relics.name: Faulty Coupler
relics.description: Every 5th orb that is channeled will aspiration:Fuse with a copy of a currently channeled orb.
relics.flavorText: ... Loneliness is... the enemy...

relics.name: Fetid Barrel
relics.description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, apply 1 Poison to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Even the tightly sealed interior cannot contain the pungent smell.

relics.name: Frozen Jewel
relics.description: At the end of your turn, gain 2 Block for every enemy that intends to attack. Gain Blur if there are multiple enemies and all intend to attack.
relics.flavorText: In your numb embrace, it pulses with comforting energy.

relics.name: Hummingbird Heart
relics.description: For the first 2 turns of combat, receive 50% less damage from attacks.
relics.flavorText: A thousand beats a minute, the power of your heart is incredible but wanes fast.

relics.name: Sea Salt Ice Cream
relics.description:
Upon pickup, store a copy of one of your relics and obtain the relic you previously stored.

Previously stored:
Circlet
relics.flavorText: Bonds forged by the heart can never be broken.

relics.name: Anachronic Snail Shell
relics.description: Store up to 6 unblocked damage taken from enemies until the end of your next turn.
relics.flavorText: This piece of a snail's shell resists the flow of time, tumbling along at its own paradoxical pace.

relics.name: Hat of Infinite Power
relics.description: During the first two turns of combat, all Powers are free.
relics.flavorText: It's brimming with energy as if powered by one thousand explosions!

relics.name: Mysterious Core
relics.description: At the end of every even-numbered turn, Channel 1 random orb.
relics.flavorText: Secondary systems have reported anamalous charge generation. Observation recommended.

relics.name: Snecko Tail
relics.description: Whenever you play a poison-related card, apply 1 Dizzy to the target(s).
relics.flavorText: The tail of a fearsome Snecko. The fluids it secretes are excellent for transferring your toxins.

relics.name: The D6
relics.description: Right click to activate.Reroll all Relic and Potion rewards in the current reward screen. Works 6 times.
relics.flavorText: Destiny, but a dice roll away.

relics.name: Art of War (read)
relics.description: If you do not play any Attacks during your turn, gain an additional [E] and attacks deal double damage next turn.
relics.flavorText: This ancient manuscript contains wisdom from a past age. You've taken it's teachings to heart.

relics.name: Baby Byrd
relics.description:
Teach your little companion about your tools of trade and he'll repay you in kind.

(It does something at the start of battle once you have amassed enough charges.)
relics.flavorText: For better or for worse, you've decided that this untainted creature deserves a better life.

relics.name: Headhunter
relics.description: Gain Charges after killing a monster, gain a set of buffs at the start of battle depending on the amount of stored Charges. Visiting non-monster rooms makes Charges decay based on the type of room. Right-click to see more information.
relics.flavorText: A belt of severed heads, the first step on the path of exiling yourself from this place of the damned.

relics.name: Lifesprig
relics.description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain [E] next turn.
relics.flavorText: From the weakest slime to the strongest abomination, hostile life thrives in the spire. Maybe, so can you.

relics.name: Nothing
relics.description: Does nothing.
relics.flavorText: I told you so.

relics.name: Ritual Stick
relics.description: The first time you lose HP each combat, gain 1 Ritual.
relics.flavorText: If only you could express yourself better.

relics.name: Stabinomicon
relics.description: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, apply 2 Grievous Ï€Wounds to the target.
relics.flavorText: "How do you reach a heart? With a knife." - Blizzarre, runic archmagus

relics.name: Bard's Skillbook
relics.description:
Each card you play may also bard:Queue bard:Notes. At the end of your turn, bard:Queue a [WildNote].

Multiclass Bard
relics.flavorText: A notebook used as a book for notes.

relics.name: Beaked's Skillbook
relics.description:
At the start of each turn, if you only played attacks last turn, gain 1 Strength and heal HP equal to your Strength.

Multiclass Beaked
relics.flavorText: These religious texts depict the awakening of the "Chosen One" before devolving into nonesense.

relics.name: Burster Core
relics.description: Replaces Cracked Core. Whenever an Orb is evoked by channeling with no empty slots, that Orb is evoked twice.
relics.flavorText: Goes off vigorously when filled to the brim.

relics.name: Defect's Skillbook
relics.description:
At the start of each combat, gain 2 Orb slots and Channel that many random Orbs.
Whenever you play a Power, Channel a random Orb at the start of your turn for 3 turns.

Multiclass Defect
relics.flavorText: Pages upon pages filled with meticulously written 1s and 0s, what could this mean?

relics.name: Future Diary
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of each turn.
At the start of each turn a random card in your hand is picked. You cannot play other cards while that card is in your hand.
relics.flavorText: It's hard to live in the present if your future is in your hand.

relics.name: Ironclad's Skillbook
relics.description:
Before the start of your turn, if you have Block, gain 1 Strength. At the end of combat, heal 4 HP.

Multiclass Ironclad
relics.flavorText: An abused book that contains the hasty scribbles of an angry being.

relics.name: Mageblood
relics.description:
You cannot use potions. You cannot have rare potions.
At the start of combat, gain all your potion effects.
relics.flavorText: Rivers of power course through your veins.

relics.name: Marisa's Skillbook
relics.description:
Whenever you play a card, gain Charge-up equal to its cost+#b1.

Multiclass Marisa
relics.flavorText: A handwritten tome written by an ordinary, human witch. She must like mushrooms.

relics.name: Mechanical Eye
relics.description: At the start of the first 3 turns each combat, put a card from your draw pile into your hand.
relics.flavorText: 20/20 Hindsight.

relics.name: Mobile Forge
relics.description: Whenever you play an upgraded card, runesmith:Enhance a random card in your hand. Whenever you play an enhanced card, Upgrade a random card in your hand.
relics.flavorText: A pet-like machine that started to follow you on your journey.

relics.name: Poet's Pen
relics.description: Whenever you play an Attack, play the top card of your draw pile if it's an Attack, otherwise discard it.
relics.flavorText: In every piece of prose, lies a tiny spark of magic. With this tool, you may craft beauty even on this most dreary of canvasses.

relics.name: Poet's Pen
relics.description:
Whenever you play an Attack, play the top card of your draw pile.
Start combat with 6 stacks of Weak, Frail and Vulnerable on you, reduced by Experience.
relics.flavorText: In every piece of prose, lies a tiny spark of magic. With this tool, you may craft beauty even on this most dreary of canvasses.

relics.name: Random Nob Generator
relics.description: Gain [E] [E] at the start of each turn. At the start of each combat, spawn a Gremlin Nob 40% of the time.
relics.flavorText: We spent so much time to see if we could, we didn't think about if we should.

relics.name: Ritual Dagger
relics.description: Lose 3 HP at the start of your turn. When you would die in combat, heal to your Max HP instead and gain permanently Awoken (works once).
relics.flavorText: With every move you make, you feel the dagger dig in deeper into your being. You fear what you may become if you give in.

relics.name: Runesmith's Skillbook
relics.description:
The first time you play an Attack each turn, for each prior turn ended without playing an Attack, runesmith:Enhance that many random cards in your hand that amount of times.

Multiclass Runesmith
relics.flavorText: This seems to be a beginners guide to arcane forgery. The hammer section has been taken special care of.

relics.name: Runic Spoon
relics.description: In each combat, add a copy of every 3rd card you manually play into your hand, it costs 1 more until played.
relics.flavorText: Maybe you could read the runes if the spoon didn't wiggle around so much.

relics.name: Secret Technique Scroll
relics.description: At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card. Whenever you shuffle your discard pile, add 3 random cards to your draw pile. They cost 0 until played.
relics.flavorText: "Promise me you'll never use these" - Teacher

relics.name: Servant's Skillbook
relics.description:
At the start of each turn, if you took no HP damage last turn, gain 3 Sattelites. Whenever a Sattelite is used, gain Protection equal to its damage.

Multiclass Servant
relics.flavorText: An elegant list on how to clean a... mansion? graces these pages.

relics.name: Silent's Skillbook
relics.description:
Whenever you play 4 or more cards on your turn, at the start of your next turn, discard any number of cards then draw that many.

Multiclass Silent
relics.flavorText: Pages filled with information on how to deal with this place. A talk with the author should be enlightening.

relics.name: Stellarator
relics.description: The first time each turn when channeling an orb fills your orb slots, aspiration:Fuse all orbs.
relics.flavorText: Who needs the Inserter if you can just squeeze!

relics.name: Watcher's Skillbook
relics.description:
Whenever you play an Attack and then a Skill or vice versa, gain 1 Mantra.

Multiclass Watcher
relics.flavorText: These pages just seem to have a bunch of random indentations...

relics.name: Earplugs
relics.description: Whenever you would gain bard:Inspiration, apply 1 Weak and Vulnerable for every 25 inspiration to a random enemy instead.
relics.flavorText: Faith in ones skills is always useful in one way or another.

relics.name: Kaom's Heart
relics.description: Raise your Max HP by 100 and become unable to obtain new relics FOR THE ENTIRE RUN.
relics.flavorText: The warrior who fears, will fail. Never look back. Never stop. Never surrender.

relics.name: Nostalgia
relics.description: Upon pickup, obtain a random Starter Relic.
relics.flavorText: Take heart in the memory of those that came before.

keywords.name: Fuse
keywords.description: Combine multiple orbs and their effects into a single orb.

mods.name: Aspiration
mods.description:
A mod adding relics, cards and events with varying themes. There's no real end goal behind it, just me implementing neat ideas that come my way via reddit, Discord, other games or even my imagination.

 For a full list of everything added and an up to date look at what I'm working on, you can take a look at my Github Repository here: https://github.com/erasels/Aspiration-StS/ 

Let me know if you have questions, suggestions or found an error.
